title: Coinbase says SEC intends to drop lawsuit against crypto exchange
summary: The SEC intends to dismiss its two-year lawsuit against Coinbase—a key part of its effort to regulate crypto as a stock exchange
description: The SEC intends to dismiss its two-year lawsuit against Coinbase—a key part of its effort to regulate crypto as a stock exchange
